ygData.subject: Re: New to tinkering...best way to raise skill?
ygData.msgSnippet: Yikes! It costs approx. 2pp to make a flameless lantern, and THIS is the item used to increase skill?? How many lanterns does it take to increase 1 point?
ygData.messageBody:
Yikes! It costs approx. 2pp to make a flameless lantern, and THIS is the
item used to increase skill??
How many lanterns does it take to increase 1 point? This sounds extremely
expensive to me.
I eventually want to make Mechanized Lockpicks, but it sounds like this is
gonna be way too costly. Any profit in tinkering at all?

Thanks for any help,

Kreena Nimbletoes
14th lvl Fighter ;)
Prexus

>Making flameless lanterns is the way to go to gain skill, a warning though
>one of the patches sort of messed with tinkering where you will rarely gain
>skill points now. I don't know if this has been changed.
>
>The only place to buy tinkering components is in Steamfont.
>
>-Luke
>
